name: quick-feet
effect: Whenever this Pokémon has a major status ailment, it has 1.5× its Speed. This Pokémon is not affected by the usual Speed cut from paralysis. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved.
short_effect: Increases Speed to 1.5× with a major status ailment.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokémon has a status condition.
